{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-10T12:46:47.000Z", "description": "

Sr. Software Engineer Job Description

The Sr. Software Engineer position is accountable to deliver highest quality software for UHG/Optum next generation web-based Provider portals, applications, and solutions. As an integral member of the technology delivery team, the Sr. Software Engineer will be a primary contributor in designing, coding, testing, debugging, documenting and supporting software applications consistent with established specifications and business requirements to deliver business value. The ideal candidate has 4+ years full-stack software engineering experience and proficiency in Microservices Architecture.



Required Skills:

\u00b7 4+ years of experience with Java (Must have Java 8 or higher)

\u00b7 2+ years of Experience in Spring Boot or Spring MVC

\u00b7 2+ years of Experience in Developing Rest Services

\u00b7 2+ years of experience with Git

\u00b7 2+years of experience in Kafka

\u00b7 1+ years of experience with Dependency Injection framework

\u00b7 3+ years of experience in Microservices

\u00b7 5+ years of software development experience.

\u00b7 3+ years of experience with agile development methodologies.

\u00b7 1+ years of experience with Test-Driven Development using automated testing frameworks

\u00b7 3+ years of experience ensuring your code builds and deploys properly through Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment processes built in Jenkins.

\u00b7
